Service Details: - Aims to reduce the harm that can be caused by superstition, pseudoscience and religion by promoting reason, science and secularism- Provides a support group for people who are leaving religion
How to Apply: Please come to one of our events or contact us via the website
Cost: Membership ; - Members receive discounts on tickets, etc.- Non-members are welcome at our events
